name: Yoga Mat
description: Our mat is crafted with a natural rubber base and a specially engineered eco-polyurethane top layer. It’s designed to be both longer and wider, offering ample space for your practice while striking the perfect balance between firm support and soft cushioning.

attributes.Grip: Unmatched grip ensuring stability even during sweaty sessions.
attributes.Comfort: Enhanced stability and cushioning with a durable rubber foundation.
attributes.Material: Natural rubber base and polyurethane top surface
Care Instructions: Put a little soap on a damp soft sponge or damp microfiber towel.
Apply evenly across mat.
Take a clean towel and wipe the mat.
Leave it rolled out to dry.
Do not leave the mat out in the sun for extended periods of time.

shippingAndReturns.returnEligibility: Within 3 days of receiving the product
shippingAndReturns.conditions: Products must be in original packaging and condition. Defective items require details upon return request.
shippingAndReturns.nonReturnable: No returns or refunds after 3 days. Items showing excessive use or misuse are ineligible for return or refund.
shippingAndReturns.refundProcess: Refunds will be issued to the original payment method within 7-10 business days after inspection of the returned product.

name: Resistance Bands Set
description: Shaped resistance bands are designed for premium performance, staying securely in place during workouts with wide silicone taping for a no-slip grip.

Care Instructions: Hand wash in cold water (Each color washed in fresh new water).
Lay them out to air dry.

name: Dumbbells
description: Weighing 2 kg each, Shaped Bars are built for both strength and versatility. Their sleek and ergonomic design ensures balanced weight distribution for a comfortable, seamless workout experience.

attributes.Ideal for: Walking, Pilates, strength training, HIIT, boxing, and aerobics.
attributes.Material: Premium steel with a smooth silicone coating
Care Instructions: Wipe after each use with a damp cloth to remove sweat and dirt.
Use mild soap and water for deeper cleaning, avoiding harsh chemicals.
Dry thoroughly before storing to prevent rusting.
Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
